vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Simeon(?) living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.4.35;
father of: Seraiah (H8304K)
§ Asiel = "made by God"
a Simeonite and ancestor of Jehu
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞薛 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在希伯來文的意思是 "神所造的"
一位西緬人, 耶戶的祖先 #代上 4:35|
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
亚薛 这个阳性专有名词 人名在希伯来文的意思是 "神所造的"
一位西缅人, 耶户的祖先 #代上 4:35|
